rules.natural: If batch Z fails quality testing, then either excipient Y experiences raw material shortage or excipient Y experiences supplier delay.
Either batch Z fails quality testing or contamination is detected in batch Z.
Provided that contamination is detected in batch Z, it follows that either excipient Y has raw material shortage or excipient Y has supplier delay.
Whenever formulation W undergoes accelerated aging testing, either formulation W passes stability study or compound X becomes profitable.
Formulation W undergoes accelerated aging testing or formulation W undergoes real-time stability testing.
If batch Z is rejected, then batch Z is subject to product recall.

Provided that plant A undergoes quality control inspection, if it is not the case that whenever formulation W undergoes real-time stability testing then either formulation W passes stability study or compound X is profitable, then batch Z is rejected.
Either plant A undergoes quality control inspection or plant A has audit findings.

Whenever plant A has audit findings, if it is not the case that under the condition that formulation W undergoes real-time stability testing then either formulation W passes stability study or compound X is profitable, then batch Z is rejected.
Provided that compound X has patent filing, it follows that compound X has intellectual property protection.
Under the condition that compound X undergoes prior art search, if compound X has intellectual property protection then compound X has patent protection.
If manufacturing line B undergoes process validation, then provided that compound X does not undergo prior art search, compound X receives patent rejection.
Whenever manufacturing line B has equipment qualification, if compound X does not undergo prior art search then compound X receives patent rejection.
If manufacturing line B has validation protocol, then manufacturing line B undergoes process validation.
Either manufacturing line B has validation protocol or manufacturing line B has qualification study.
Provided that manufacturing line B has qualification study, it follows that manufacturing line B has equipment qualification.
If pill form undergoes dissolution testing, then formulation W passes stability study.
Under the condition that pill form undergoes bioavailability study, compound X becomes profitable.
Provided that compound X has excipient modifications, compound X has delivery system updates.
If compound X receives market authorization, then compound X obtains regulatory approval.
Whenever manufacturing line B has equipment upgrades, manufacturing line B has process improvements.

Provided that manufacturing line B has CAPA implementation, if it is not the case that either manufacturing line B undergoes process validation or manufacturing line B has equipment qualification, then manufacturing line B has equipment upgrades.
Either manufacturing line B has CAPA implementation or manufacturing line B has deviation management.

Under the condition that manufacturing line B has deviation management, if it is not the case that either manufacturing line B undergoes process validation or manufacturing line B has equipment qualification, then manufacturing line B has equipment upgrades.
Either compound X undergoes production scale-up or compound X undergoes manufacturing optimization.
Whenever compound X undergoes manufacturing optimization, compound X becomes profitable.
Either compound X experiences supply chain issues or if compound X undergoes production scale-up then compound X is profitable.
If excipient Y has raw material shortage, then compound X does not experience supply chain issues.
Provided that excipient Y has supplier delay, compound X does not experience supply chain issues.

Provided that it is not the case that under the condition that formulation W undergoes real-time stability testing then either formulation W passes stability study or compound X is profitable, batch Z is not subject to product recall.
Whenever it is not the case that either manufacturing line B undergoes process validation or manufacturing line B has equipment qualification, manufacturing line B does not have process improvements.
If it is not the case that whenever compound X completes Phase III trials then compound X obtains regulatory approval, then compound X has efficacy data.
Provided that it is not the case that either compound X has safety profile data or compound X does not have efficacy data, compound X has adverse events.
Whenever it is not the case that either pill form undergoes dissolution testing or pill form undergoes bioavailability study, compound X has excipient modifications.
If it is not the case that either pill form undergoes dissolution testing or pill form undergoes bioavailability study, then compound X does not have formulation changes.

Provided that it is not the case that either compound X has shelf life extension or if compound X has delivery system updates then compound X has formulation changes, compound X has packaging redesign.

Under the condition that it is not the case that either compound X has shelf life extension or if compound X has delivery system updates then compound X has formulation changes, compound X does not have packaging redesign.

If it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that if compound X is not profitable then compound X is not approved for research then compound X has clinical trial success, then compound X completes Phase III trials.

Whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that if compound X is not profitable then compound X is not approved for research then compound X has clinical trial success, compound X receives market authorization.

Under the condition that it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if compound X is not profitable then compound X is not approved for research then compound X has clinical trial success, compound X does not obtain regulatory approval.
Provided that it is not the case that if compound X is not profitable then compound X is not approved for research, compound X does not have clinical trial success.
Under the condition that compound X does not undergo prior art search, compound X does not receive patent rejection.
If compound X is not profitable, then compound X is approved for research.
Whenever compound X is not profitable, compound X has patent filing.
